title: I CAN'T RECLAIM MY SKIN
body: hi yall i went to the LNN final and they gave a skin as a gift(code) i can't reclaim the code so i want to know if this is only for LAN(server) where i get this skin code.

replies.body:
hmmm I can't guarantee that they CAN, but at least it should be worth the effort to submit a support ticket and see if they can give you some account help with this. Doesn't hurt to ask.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
thank you so much man u help me a lot!

Typically these codes are region specific, so you won't be able to use that LAN code on, for example, the NA server. If it's not working on the server it's meant for, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a look at that code.
i already sent u guys the ticket thank u so much ! hopefully u guys can take a look.{{champion:117}}
OMG thank u so much man u guys are the best always! I am sendig u guys the ticket right now

I'm like, almost 100% sure that codes are definitely specific to the region you got them in.
So if it is a code from a LAN event, it will probably on LAN server.
oh:( i didnt know oh man i just hope riot can help me somehow:/
